## ProgramBuilder.main() method

Create the main entry function of the shader

**Signature:**

```typescript
main(body?: (this: PBFunctionScope) => void): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  body | (this: [PBFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbfunctionscope.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ The shader generator function |
